ygData.subject: Re: reason for that email
ygData.msgSnippet: no one cares about your damn email problems.  just get it off this damn list already.
ygData.messageBody:
no one cares about your damn email problems. just get it off this damn
list already.



On Wed, 4 Aug 1999, Nick wrote:

> From: "Nick" <brutalny@...>
>
> I'm sorry if that email bothered any of you, but I did it because a person
> on this list (the one named in that email) decided to pick up my email
> address and spam me with long emails over and over. It was a warning to
> please not take my email address from this list and spam me.
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> ONElist now has T-SHIRTS!
> For details and to order, go to:
> http://www.onelist.com/store/tshirts.html
